00010 #ifndef BOOST_TT_ADD_CONST_HPP_INCLUDED
00011 #define BOOST_TT_ADD_CONST_HPP_INCLUDED
00012 
00013 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00014 
00015 // should be the last #include
00016 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/type_trait_def.hpp"
00017 
00018 namespace boost {
00019 
00020 // * convert a type T to const type - add_const<T>
00021 // this is not required since the result is always
00022 // the same as "T const", but it does suppress warnings
00023 // from some compilers:
00024 
00025 #if defined(BOOST_MSVC)
00026 // This bogus warning will appear when add_const is applied to a
00027 // const volatile reference because we can't detect const volatile
00028 // references with MSVC6.
00029 #   pragma warning(push)
00030 #   pragma warning(disable:4181) // warning C4181: qualifier applied to reference type ignored
00031 #endif 
00032 
00033 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_DEF1(add_const,T,T const)
00034 
00035 #if defined(BOOST_MSVC)
00036 #   pragma warning(pop)
00037 #endif 
00038 
00039 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00040 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,add_const,T&,T&)
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 } // namespace boost
00044 
00045 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/type_trait_undef.hpp"
00046 
00047 #endif // BOOST_TT_ADD_CONST_HPP_INCLUDED
